poemsDataJson.list_full: 明(あ)けぬれば 暮(く)るるものとは 知(し)りながら なほ恨(うら)めしき 朝(あさ)ぼらけかな
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Though I know indeed//That the night will come again//After day has dawned,//Still, in truth, I hate the sight//Of the morning's coming light.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Ake nureba|Kururu mono to wa|Shiri nagara|Nao urameshiki|Asa-borake kana
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: なほうらめしき あさほらけかな
poemsDataJson.author: 藤原道信朝臣(ふじわらのみちのぶあそん)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: また逢えると知りながらも別れて帰る夜明けのつらさ
